name: ModrinthChecker
description: A comprehensive cog that monitors Modrinth projects (mods, modpacks, resource packs, shaders) for updates and sends notifications to Discord channels.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores project monitoring configurations, Discord channel IDs, and user preferences for notifications.
install_msg: Thanks for installing ModrinthChecker! Use `[p]modrinth add <project_id>` to start monitoring projects.
author: Kd_Gaming1
